name: Abandoned Life
description: Abandoned Life is a third-person zombie shooter game, where you can complete missions with the help of companions. The game artwork is in polygon style. This game features creatures inspired by post-apocalypse games. The game consists of multiple objectives in each chapter, which keep players engaged all the time. Players have to defeat the bosses and protect themselves from being eaten by zombies before they reach a safe house. In the next version of the game, players can play the game online with their friends.
